name: getbookcoverurl
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool book_cover_api.
Tool description: Simple api to get book cover by isbn code.
API description: Fetches the URL of a book cover image using the provided language code and ISBN.

languagecode.description: The language code in which the book cover information is required.

isbn.description: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) of the book.
